title: BMSCE Intake is now 1800 for cse related branches is it still a viable option over pes

comments.body: Probably only if you get BMSCE through KCET and PES through PESSAT and these are your only options. Also, how can someone justify there being an AIDS degree AND a CSE+DS degree? Lol just business.
So pes over bms if through kcet
Do u think campus life and placements will be severely affected by these increase in seats?
Lol I was hesitant of joining pesu through pessat over bms through comedk. Now I can take the decision without any regret
Bruh I thought bmsce could give a blend of college life and placements but now..
college life wont change a lot i think....placements are left upon bms management and how they can attract more companies to compansate for more students
Bruh, this batch is cursed fr.
